Create a Controller to Handle the Upload</h2><p data-start="1536" data-end="1572">Generate a controller using Artisan:</p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="1574" data-end="1634"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">bash</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none px-4 py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-xs"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-bash"><span>php artisan make:controller FileUploadController
</span></code></div></div></pre><p data-start="1636" data-end="1718">Then, in your controller, add the <code data-start="1670" data-end="1678">upload</code> method to handle the file upload logic.</p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="1720" data-end="2985"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">php</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none px-4 py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-xs"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-php"><span><span class="hljs-comment">// app/Http/Controllers/FileUploadController.php</span>

<span class="hljs-keyword">namespace</span> <span class="hljs-title class_">App</span>\<span class="hljs-title class_">Http</span>\<span class="hljs-title class_">Controllers</span>;

<span class="hljs-keyword">use</span> <span class="hljs-title">Illuminate</span>\<span class="hljs-title">Http</span>\<span class="hljs-title">Request</span>;

<span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span> <span class="hljs-title">FileUploadController</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">extends</span> <span class="hljs-title">Controller</span>
</span>{
    <span class="hljs-keyword">public</span> <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> <span class="hljs-title">upload</span>(<span class="hljs-params">Request <span class="hljs-variable">$request</span></span>)
    </span>{
        <span class="hljs-comment">// Validate the file input. Here you can define file type, size, etc.</span>
        <span class="hljs-variable">$request</span>-&gt;<span class="hljs-title function_ invoke__">validate</span>([
            <span class="hljs-string">'file'</span> =&gt; <span class="hljs-string">'required|file|mimes:jpg,jpeg,png,pdf,doc,docx|max:2048'</span>,
        ]);

        <span class="hljs-comment">// Check if the file is valid and was uploaded.</span>
        <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (<span class="hljs-variable">$request</span>-&gt;<span class="hljs-title function_ invoke__">hasFile</span>(<span class="hljs-string">'file'</span>)) {
            <span class="hljs-comment">// Get the uploaded file.</span>
            <span class="hljs-variable">$file</span> = <span class="hljs-variable">$request</span>-&gt;<span class="hljs-title function_ invoke__">file</span>(<span class="hljs-string">'file'</span>);

            <span class="hljs-comment">// Generate a unique file name.</span>
            <span class="hljs-variable">$fileName</span> = <span class="hljs-title function_ invoke__">time</span>() . <span class="hljs-string">'_'</span> . <span class="hljs-variable">$file</span>-&gt;<span class="hljs-title function_ invoke__">getClientOriginalName</span>();

            <span class="hljs-comment">// Store the file in the 'uploads' directory inside the storage/app/public folder.</span>
            <span class="hljs-comment">// Make sure you have run "php artisan storage:link" to create a symbolic link to the public folder.</span>
            <span class="hljs-variable">$filePath</span> = <span class="hljs-variable">$file</span>-&gt;<span class="hljs-title function_ invoke__">storeAs</span>(<span class="hljs-string">'uploads'</span>, <span class="hljs-variable">$fileName</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'public'</span>);

            <span class="hljs-comment">// Optionally, you can store file path or other details in the database.</span>

            <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-title function_ invoke__">back</span>()-&gt;<span class="hljs-title function_ invoke__">with</span>(<span class="hljs-string">'success'</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'File uploaded successfully.'</span>)-&gt;<span class="hljs-title function_ invoke__">with</span>(<span class="hljs-string">'file'</span>, <span class="hljs-variable">$fileName</span>);
        }

        <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-title function_ invoke__">back</span>()-&gt;<span class="hljs-title function_ invoke__">with</span>(<span class="hljs-string">'error'</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'File upload failed.'</span>);
    }
}
</span></code></div></div></pre><hr data-start="2987" data-end="2990"><h2 data-start="2992" data-end="3034">4. Create a Storage Symlink (If Needed)</h2><p data-start="3036" data-end="3198">If you want to access uploaded files from your public directory, run this Artisan command to create a symbolic link from <code data-start="3157" data-end="3177">storage/app/public</code> to <code data-start="3181" data-end="3197">public/storage</code>:</p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="3200" data-end="3236"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">bash</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none px-4 py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-xs"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-bash"><span>php artisan storage:<span class="hljs-built_in">link</span>
</span></code></div></div></pre><hr data-start="3238" data-end="3241"><h2 data-start="3243" data-end="3301">5. Display Success Message and Uploaded File (Optional)</h2><p data-start="3303" data-end="3385">You can modify your Blade template to show a success message or the uploaded file.</p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="3387" data-end="4588"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">blade</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none px-4 py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-xs"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-blade"><span>&lt;!-- resources/views/upload.blade.php --&gt;
&lt;!DOCTYPE html&gt;
&lt;html&gt;
&lt;head&gt;
    &lt;title&gt;Upload File&lt;/title&gt;
&lt;/head&gt;
&lt;body&gt;
    &lt;h1&gt;Upload a File&lt;/h1&gt;

    @if(session('success'))
        &lt;div&gt;
            &lt;p&gt;{{ session('success') }}&lt;/p&gt;
            &lt;p&gt;File: {{ session('file') }}&lt;/p&gt;
            &lt;!-- Display the uploaded file if it's an image --&gt;
            @if (in_array(pathinfo(session('file'), PATHINFO_EXTENSION), ['jpg', 'jpeg', 'png']))
                &lt;img src="{{ asset('storage/uploads/' . session('file')) }}" alt="Uploaded Image" style="max-width:300px;"&gt;
            @endif
        &lt;/div&gt;
    @endif

    &lt;!-- Validation errors --&gt;
    @if ($errors-&gt;any())
        &lt;div&gt;
            &lt;ul&gt;
                @foreach ($errors-&gt;all() as $error)
                    &lt;li&gt;{{ $error }}&lt;/li&gt;
                @endforeach
            &lt;/ul&gt;
        &lt;/div&gt;
    @endif

    &lt;form action="{{ route('file.upload') }}" method="POST" enctype="multipart/form-data"&gt;
        @csrf
        &lt;div&gt;
            &lt;label for="file"&gt;Choose a file:&lt;/label&gt;
            &lt;input type="file" name="file" id="file" required&gt;
        &lt;/div&gt;
        &lt;button type="submit"&gt;Upload&lt;/button&gt;
    &lt;/form&gt;
&lt;/body&gt;
&lt;/html&gt;
</span></code></div></div></pre><hr data-start="4590" data-end="4593"><h2 data-start="4595" data-end="4605">Summary</h2><ol data-start="4607" data-end="5010"><li data-start="4607" data-end="4700"><strong data-start="4610" data-end="4625">Blade Form:</strong> Create a form with <code data-start="4645" data-end="4676">enctype="multipart/form-data"</code> to handle file uploads.</li><li data-start="4701" data-end="4772"><strong data-start="4704" data-end="4715">Routes:</strong> Set up GET and POST routes for the upload functionality.</li><li data-start="4773" data-end="4887"><strong data-start="4776" data-end="4791">Controller:</strong> Validate the request, handle the file upload using the <code data-start="4847" data-end="4856">storeAs</code> method, and return a response.</li><li data-start="4888" data-end="5010"><strong data-start="4891" data-end="4908">Storage Link:</strong> Create a symbolic link using <code data-start="4938" data-end="4964">php artisan storage:link</code> to make stored files accessible from the web.</li></ol><p data-start="5012" data-end="5137" data-is-last-node="" data-is-only-node="">This approach ensures that file uploads in Laravel are handled securely and efficiently. dark:prose-invert dark"><p data-start="0" data-end="246">A <strong data-start="2" data-end="12">seeder</strong> in Laravel is a class used to populate your database with test or initial data automatically. It's like a data chef that preps your database with the ingredients (records) you need before you start cooking (running your application).</p><hr data-start="248" data-end="251"><h3 data-start="253" data-end="273">Why Use Seeders?</h3><ul data-start="275" data-end="722"><li data-start="275" data-end="418"><p data-start="277" data-end="418"><strong data-start="277" data-end="303">Testing &amp; Development:</strong><br data-start="303" data-end="306">Quickly fill your database with sample data to test features without having to manually enter data every time.</p></li><li data-start="420" data-end="572"><p data-start="422" data-end="572"><strong data-start="422" data-end="440">Initial Setup:</strong><br data-start="440" data-end="443">Populate tables with default values or configuration data (like admin users, settings, etc.) when setting up a new application.</p></li><li data-start="574" data-end="722"><p data-start="576" data-end="722"><strong data-start="576" data-end="596">Reproducibility:</strong><br data-start="596" data-end="599">Easily recreate a consistent state for your database, which is especially useful in team environments or CI/CD pipelines.</p></li></ul><hr data-start="724" data-end="727"><h3 data-start="729" data-end="751">How to Use Seeders</h3><ol data-start="753" data-end="2524"><li data-start="753" data-end="1004"><p data-start="756" data-end="868"><strong data-start="756" data-end="782">Create a Seeder Class:</strong><br data-start="782" data-end="785">Use Artisan to generate a new seeder. For example, to create a seeder for users:</p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="873" data-end="931"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">bash</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none px-4 py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-xs"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-bash"><span>php artisan make:seeder UsersTableSeeder
</span></code></div></div></pre><p data-start="936" data-end="1004">This command creates a new file in the <code data-start="975" data-end="993">database/seeders</code> directory.</p></li><li data-start="1006" data-end="1695"><p data-start="1009" data-end="1164"><strong data-start="1009" data-end="1031">Define the Seeder:</strong><br data-start="1031" data-end="1034">Open the generated seeder file and define the <code data-start="1083" data-end="1090">run()</code> method. This is where you'll write the logic to insert data. <span class="hljs-keyword">namespace</span> <span class="hljs-title class_">Database</span>\<span class="hljs-title class_">Seeders</span>;

<span class="hljs-keyword">use</span> <span class="hljs-title">Illuminate</span>\<span class="hljs-title">Database</span>\<span class="hljs-title">Seeder</span>;
<span class="hljs-keyword">use</span> <span class="hljs-title">App</span>\<span class="hljs-title">Models</span>\<span class="hljs-title">User</span>;

<span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span> <span class="hljs-title">UsersTableSeeder</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">extends</span> <span class="hljs-title">Seeder</span>
</span>{
    <span class="hljs-keyword">public</span> <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> <span class="hljs-title">run</span>(<span class="hljs-params"></span>)
    </span>{
        <span class="hljs-comment">// Creating a single user</span>
        <span class="hljs-title class_">User</span>::<span class="hljs-title function_ invoke__">create</span>([
            <span class="hljs-string">'name'</span> =&gt; <span class="hljs-string">'Admin User'</span>,
            <span class="hljs-string">'email'</span> =&gt; <span class="hljs-string">'admin@example.com'</span>,
            <span class="hljs-string">'password'</span> =&gt; <span class="hljs-title function_ invoke__">bcrypt</span>(<span class="hljs-string">'password'</span>),
        ]);

        <span class="hljs-comment">// Or, create multiple users using factories</span>

    }
}
</span></code></div></div></pre></li><li data-start="1697" data-end="2157"><p data-start="1700" data-end="1844"><strong data-start="1700" data-end="1724">Register the Seeder:</strong><br data-start="1724" data-end="1727">Include your seeder in the <code data-start="1757" data-end="1773">DatabaseSeeder</code> class so that it's executed when you run the database seeding command:</p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="1849" data-end="2157"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">php</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none px-4 py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-xs"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-php"><span><span class="hljs-meta">&lt;?php</span>

<span class="hljs-keyword">namespace</span> <span class="hljs-title class_">Database</span>\<span class="hljs-title class_">Seeders</span>;

<span class="hljs-keyword">use</span> <span class="hljs-title">Illuminate</span>\<span class="hljs-title">Database</span>\<span class="hljs-title">Seeder</span>;

<span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span> <span class="hljs-title">DatabaseSeeder</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">extends</span> <span class="hljs-title">Seeder</span>

        <span class="hljs-variable language_">$this</span>-&gt;<span class="hljs-title function_ invoke__">call</span>([
            <span class="hljs-title class_">UsersTableSeeder</span>::<span class="hljs-variable language_">class</span>,
            // Add other seeders here
        ]);
    }
}
</span></code></div></div></pre></li><li data-start="2159" data-end="2524"><p data-start="2162" data-end="2232"><strong data-start="2162" data-end="2181">Run the Seeder:</strong><br data-start="2181" data-end="2184">Execute the seeder using the Artisan command:</p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="2237" data-end="2274"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">bash</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none px-4 py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-xs"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-bash"><span>php artisan db:seed
</span></code></div></div></pre><p data-start="2279" data-end="2321">If you want to run a specific seeder, use:</p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="2326" data-end="2388"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">bash</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none px-4 py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-xs"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-bash"><span>php artisan db:seed --class=UsersTableSeeder
</span></code></div></div></pre><p data-start="2393" data-end="2469">For a fresh start, you can refresh your database and seed it in one command:</p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="2474" data-end="2524"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">bash</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none px-4 py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-xs"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-bash"><span>php artisan migrate:fresh --seed
</span></code></div></div></pre></li></ol><hr data-start="2526" data-end="2529"><h3 data-start="2531" data-end="2542">Summary</h3><ul data-start="2544" data-end="3088"><li data-start="2544" data-end="2617"><strong data-start="2546" data-end="2557">Seeder:</strong> A class that seeds your database with initial or test data.</li><li data-start="2618" data-end="2706"><strong data-start="2620" data-end="2628">Why:</strong> To quickly populate your database for development, testing, or initial setup.</li><li data-start="2707" data-end="2883"><strong data-start="2709" Here’s what each file is for:</p><hr data-start="120" data-end="123"><h3 data-start="125" data-end="136">web.php</h3><ul data-start="138" data-end="774"><li data-start="138" data-end="463"><p data-start="140" data-end="463"><strong data-start="140" data-end="152">Purpose:</strong><br data-start="152" data-end="155">The <code data-start="161" data-end="170">web.php</code> file is for routes that serve your application's web interface. These routes use the <strong data-start="256" data-end="280">web middleware group</strong>, which provides session state, CSRF protection, cookie encryption, and more. This setup is ideal for routes that render views and manage user interactions (like forms, logins, etc.).</p></li><li data-start="465" data-end="584"><p data-start="467" data-end="481"><strong data-start="467" data-end="479">Example:</strong></p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="484" data-end="584"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">php</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none px-4 py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-xs"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-php"><span><span class="hljs-comment">// routes/web.php</span>

This file is designed for RESTful API development where each request is independent.</p></li><li data-start="1148" data-end="1279"><p data-start="1150" data-end="1164"><strong data-start="1150" data-end="1162">Example:</strong></p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="1167" data-end="1279"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">php</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none px-4 py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-xs"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-php"><span><span class="hljs-comment">// routes/api.php</span>

views.</li></ul></li><li data-start="1657" data-end="1824"><p data-start="1659" data-end="1673"><strong data-start="1659" data-end="1671">api.php:</strong></p><ul data-start="1676" data-end="1824"><li dark:prose-invert dark"><p data-start="0" data-end="169">Managing environment configuration in Laravel is all about using the <code data-start="69" data-end="75">.env</code> file along with Laravel's Here's how it works and how you can manage it:</p><hr data-start="171" data-end="174"><h3 data-start="176" data-end="198">1. The <code data-start="187" data-end="193">.env</code> File</h3><ul data-start="200" data-end="999"><li data-start="200" data-end="537"><p data-start="202" data-end="537"><strong data-start="202" data-end="214">Purpose:</strong><br data-start="214" data-end="217">The <code data-start="223" data-end="229">.env</code> file, located in the root directory, holds environment-specific settings such as the application environment (<code data-start="340" data-end="349">APP_ENV</code>), debug mode (<code data-start="364" data-end="375">APP_DEBUG</code>), database credentials, mail settings, and more. It’s loaded by the <code data-start="444" data-end="462">vlucas/phpdotenv</code> package, which makes these settings available throughout your application.</p></li><li data-start="539" data-end="803"><p data-start="541" data-end="562"><strong data-start="541" data-end="562">Example Contents:</strong></p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="566" data-end="803"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">env</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none px-4 py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-xs"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-env"><span>APP_NAME=Laravel
APP_ENV=local
APP_KEY=base64:YourKeyHere
APP_DEBUG=true
APP_URL=http://localhost

DB_CONNECTION=mysql
DB_HOST=127.0.0.1
DB_PORT=3306
DB_DATABASE=laravel_db
DB_USERNAME=root
DB_PASSWORD=
</span></code></div></div></pre></li><li data-start="805" data-end="999"><p data-start="807" data-end="999"><strong data-start="807" data-end="817">Usage:</strong><br data-start="817" data-end="820">When you update your <code data-start="843" data-end="849">.env</code> file, Laravel automatically picks up these changes. However, in production, you'll often cache the configuration for performance reasons (see below).</p></li></ul><hr data-start="1001" data-end="1004"><h3 data-start="1006" data-end="1032">2. Configuration Files</h3><ul data-start="1034" data-end="1662"><li data-start="1034" data-end="1250"><p data-start="1036" data-end="1250"><strong data-start="1036" data-end="1054">How They Work:</strong><br data-start="1054" data-end="1057">Laravel’s configuration files are stored in the <code data-start="1107" data-end="1115">config</code> directory. Each file (like <code data-start="1143" data-end="1152">app.php</code>, <code data-start="1154" data-end="1168">database.php</code>, etc.) uses the <code data-start="1185" data-end="1192">env()</code> helper function to retrieve values from your <code data-start="1238" data-end="1244">.env</code> file.</p></li><li data-start="1252" data-end="1475"><p data-start="1254" data-end="1286"><strong </span></code></div></div></pre></li><li data-start="1477" data-end="1662"><p data-start="1479" data-end="1662"><strong data-start="1479" data-end="1494">Advantages:</strong><br data-start="1494" data-end="1497">This separation means you can change settings without altering your codebase, making it easier to manage different environments (development, staging, production).</p></li></ul><hr data-start="1664" data-end="1667"><h3 data-start="1669" data-end="1697">3. data-end="2723"><strong data-start="2560" data-end="2593">Server Environment Variables:</strong><br data-start="2593" data-end="2596">In production, you might set environment variables directly on environments.</li><li data-start="2945" data-end="3028"><strong data-start="2947" data-end="2959">Caching:</strong> Use <code data-start="2964" data-end="2990">php artisan config:cache</code> in dark:prose-invert dark"><p data-start="0" data-end="369">Dependency injection is a design pattern that allows your classes to receive (or "inject") their dependencies rather than creating them internally. In Laravel, this pattern is implemented through the service container (also known as the IoC container), which automatically resolves and injects dependencies when you type-hint them in your class constructors or methods.</p><hr data-start="371" data-end="374"><h3 data-start="376" data-end="409">Why Use Dependency Injection?</h3><ul data-start="411" data-end="895"><li data-start="411" data-end="543"><p data-start="413" data-end="543"><strong data-start="413" data-end="428">Decoupling:</strong><br data-start="428" data-end="431">Your classes don’t need to know how to create their dependencies. This makes them easier to test and maintain.</p></li><li data-start="547" data-end="756"><p data-start="549" data-end="756"><strong data-start="549" data-end="565">Flexibility:</strong><br data-start="565" data-end="568">You can swap implementations without modifying the dependent class. For example, you can switch from one service to another by just binding a new implementation in the service container.</p></li><li data-start="760" data-end="895"><p data-start="762" data-end="895"><strong data-start="762" data-end="787">Automatic Resolution:</strong><br data-start="787" data-end="790">Laravel’s service container automatically instantiates your dependencies and injects them where needed.</p></li></ul><hr data-start="897" data-end="900"><h3 data-start="902" data-end="929">How It Works in Laravel</h3><ol data-start="931" data-end="1360"><li data-start="931" data-end="1110"><p data-start="934" data-end="1110"><strong data-start="934" data-end="967">Type-Hinting in Constructors:</strong><br data-start="967" data-end="970">When you type-hint a dependency in a controller’s constructor, Laravel automatically resolves that dependency from the service container.</p></li><li data-start="1112" data-end="1360"><p data-start="1115" data-end="1360"><strong data-start="1115" data-end="1160">Binding Classes to the Service Container:</strong><br data-start="1160" data-end="1163">You can bind interfaces to concrete classes or define how to resolve a class by using service providers. This allows Laravel to know which implementation to inject when a dependency is required.</p></li></ol><hr data-start="1362" data-end="1365"><h3 data-start="1367" data-end="1417">Example: Injecting a Service into a Controller</h3><p data-start="1419" data-end="1502">Imagine you have a service class that handles some business logic, say <code data-start="1490" data-end="1501">MyService</code>.</p><h4 data-start="1504" data-end="1535">Step 1: Create the Service</h4><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="1537" data-end="1683"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">php</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="hljs-meta">&lt;?php</span>

<span class="hljs-keyword">namespace</span> <span class="hljs-title class_">App</span>\<span class="hljs-title class_">Services</span>;

<span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span> <span class="hljs-title">MyService</span>
</span>{
    <span class="hljs-keyword">public</span> <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> <span class="hljs-title">performAction</span>(<span class="hljs-params"></span>)
    </span>{
        <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-string">"Action performed!"</span>;
    }
}
</span></code></div></div></pre><h4 data-start="1685" data-end="1734">Step 2: Inject the Service into a Controller</h4><p data-start="1736" data-end="1858">When you type-hint <code data-start="1755" data-end="1766">MyService</code> in the controller’s constructor, Laravel automatically provides an instance of <code data-start="1846" data-end="1857">MyService</code>.</p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="1860" data-end="2306"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">php</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none px-4 py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-xs"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-php"><span><span class="hljs-meta">&lt;?php</span>

<span class="hljs-keyword">namespace</span> <span class="hljs-title class_">App</span>\<span class="hljs-title class_">Http</span>\<span class="hljs-title class_">Controllers</span>;

<span class="hljs-keyword">use</span> <span class="hljs-title">App</span>\<span class="hljs-title">Services</span>\<span class="hljs-title">MyService</span>;

<span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span> <span class="hljs-title">MyController</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">extends</span> <span class="hljs-title">Controller</span>
</span>{
    <span class="hljs-keyword">protected</span> <span class="hljs-variable">$myService</span>;

    <span class="hljs-comment">// Dependency injection via the constructor</span>
    <span class="hljs-keyword">public</span> <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> <span class="hljs-title">__construct</span>(<span class="hljs-params">MyService <span class="hljs-variable">$myService</span></span>)
    </span>{
        <span class="hljs-variable language_">$this</span>-&gt;myService = <span class="hljs-variable">$myService</span>;
    }

    <span class="hljs-keyword">public</span> <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> <span class="hljs-title">index</span>(<span class="hljs-params"></span>)
    </span>{
        <span class="hljs-variable">$result</span> = <span class="hljs-variable language_">$this</span>-&gt;myService-&gt;<span class="hljs-title function_ invoke__">performAction</span>();
        <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-title function_ invoke__">view</span>(<span class="hljs-string">'welcome'</span>, <span class="hljs-title function_ invoke__">compact</span>(<span class="hljs-string">'result'</span>));
    }
}
</span></code></div></div></pre><p data-start="2308" data-end="2437">In this example, Laravel automatically instantiates <code data-start="2360" data-end="2371">MyService</code> and injects it into <code data-start="2392" data-end="2406">MyController</code> when the controller is called.</p><hr data-start="2439" data-end="2442"><h3 data-start="2444" data-end="2489">Binding an Interface to an Implementation</h3><p data-start="2491" data-end="2612">Suppose you have an interface and multiple implementations. You can bind a specific implementation in a service provider:</p><h4 data-start="2614" data-end="2661">Define an Interface and Its Implementation</h4><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="2663" data-end="2781"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">php</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none px-4 py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-xs"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-php"><span><span class="hljs-meta">&lt;?php</span>

<span class="hljs-keyword">namespace</span> <span class="hljs-title class_">App</span>\<span class="hljs-title class_">Contracts</span>;

<span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">interface</span> <span class="hljs-title">PaymentGatewayInterface</span>
</span>{
    <span class="hljs-keyword">public</span> <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> <span class="hljs-title">charge</span>(<span class="hljs-params"><span class="hljs-variable">$amount</span></span>)</span>;
}
</span></code></div></div></pre><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="2783" data-end="3031"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">php</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none px-4 py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-xs"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-php"><span><span class="hljs-meta">&lt;?php</span>

<span class="hljs-keyword">namespace</span> <span class="hljs-title class_">App</span>\<span class="hljs-title class_">Services</span>;

<span class="hljs-keyword">use</span> <span class="hljs-title">App</span>\<span class="hljs-title">Contracts</span>\<span class="hljs-title">PaymentGatewayInterface</span>;

<span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span> <span class="hljs-title">StripePaymentGateway</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">implements</span> <span class="hljs-title">PaymentGatewayInterface</span>
</span>{
    <span class="hljs-keyword">public</span> <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> <span class="hljs-title">charge</span>(<span class="hljs-params"><span class="hljs-variable">$amount</span></span>)
    </span>{
        <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-string">"Charging <span class="hljs-subst">$amount</span> using Stripe"</span>;
    }
}
</span></code></div></div></pre><h4 data-start="3033" data-end="3078">Bind the Interface to the Implementation</h4><p data-start="3080" data-end="3148">In your service provider (e.g., <code data-start="3112" data-end="3146">App\Providers\AppServiceProvider</code>):</p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="3150" data-end="3612"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">php</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none px-4 py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-xs"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-php"><span><span class="hljs-meta">&lt;?php</span>

<span class="hljs-keyword">namespace</span> <span class="hljs-title class_">App</span>\<span class="hljs-title class_">Providers</span>;

<span class="hljs-keyword">use</span> <span class="hljs-title">Illuminate</span>\<span class="hljs-title">Support</span>\<span class="hljs-title">ServiceProvider</span>;
<span class="hljs-keyword">use</span> <span class="hljs-title">App</span>\<span class="hljs-title">Contracts</span>\<span class="hljs-title">PaymentGatewayInterface</span>;
<span class="hljs-keyword">use</span> <span class="hljs-title">App</span>\<span class="hljs-title">Services</span>\<span class="hljs-title">StripePaymentGateway</span>;

<span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span> <span class="hljs-title">AppServiceProvider</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">extends</span> <span class="hljs-title">ServiceProvider</span>
</span>{
    <span class="hljs-keyword">public</span> <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> <span class="hljs-title">register</span>(<span class="hljs-params"></span>)
    </span>{
        <span class="hljs-comment">// Bind the interface to its concrete implementation.</span>
        <span class="hljs-variable language_">$this</span>-&gt;app-&gt;<span class="hljs-title function_ invoke__">bind</span>(<span class="hljs-title class_">PaymentGatewayInterface</span>::<span class="hljs-variable language_">class</span>, <span class="hljs-title class_">StripePaymentGateway</span>::<span class="hljs-variable language_">class</span>);
    }

    <span class="hljs-keyword">public</span> <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> <span class="hljs-title">boot</span>(<span class="hljs-params"></span>)
    </span>{
        <span class="hljs-comment">//</span>
    }
}
</span></code></div></div></pre><h4 data-start="3614" data-end="3640">Inject the Dependency</h4><p data-start="3642" data-end="3751">Now, in your controller, you can type-hint the interface, and Laravel will inject the <code data-start="3728" data-end="3750">StripePaymentGateway</code>:</p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="3753" data-end="4180"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">php</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none px-4 py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-xs"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-php"><span><span class="hljs-meta">&lt;?php</span>

<span class="hljs-keyword">namespace</span> <span class="hljs-title class_">App</span>\<span class="hljs-title class_">Http</span>\<span class="hljs-title class_">Controllers</span>;

<span class="hljs-keyword">use</span> <span class="hljs-title">App</span>\<span class="hljs-title">Contracts</span>\<span class="hljs-title">PaymentGatewayInterface</span>;

<span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span> <span class="hljs-title">PaymentController</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">extends</span> <span class="hljs-title">Controller</span>
</span>{
    <span class="hljs-keyword">protected</span> <span class="hljs-variable">$paymentGateway</span>;

    <span class="hljs-keyword">public</span> <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> <span class="hljs-title">__construct</span>(<span class="hljs-params">PaymentGatewayInterface <span class="hljs-variable">$paymentGateway</span></span>)
    </span>{
        <span class="hljs-variable language_">$this</span>-&gt;paymentGateway = <span class="hljs-variable">$paymentGateway</span>;
    }

    <span class="hljs-keyword">public</span> <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> <span class="hljs-title">charge</span>(<span class="hljs-params"></span>)
    </span>{
        <span class="hljs-variable">$result</span> = <span class="hljs-variable language_">$this</span>-&gt;paymentGateway-&gt;<span class="hljs-title function_ invoke__">charge</span>(<span class="hljs-number">100</span>);
        <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-variable">$result</span>;
    }
}
</span></code></div></div></pre><hr data-start="4182" data-end="4185"><h3 data-start="4187" data-end="4198">Summary</h3><ul data-start="4200" data-end="4554"><li data-start="4200" data-end="4347"><p data-start="4202" data-end="4347"><strong data-start="4202" data-end="4227">Dependency Injection:</strong><br data-start="4227" data-end="4230">A pattern that supplies a class with its dependencies from an external source rather than creating them internally.</p></li><li data-start="4351" data-end="4458"><p data-start="4353" data-end="4458"><strong data-start="4353" data-end="4385">Laravel's Service Container:</strong><br data-start="4385" data-end="4388">Automatically resolves and injects dependencies based on type-hints.</p></li><li data-start="4460" data-end="4554"><p data-start="4462" data-end="4554"><strong data-start="4462" data-end="4475">Benefits:</strong><br data-start="4475" data-end="4478">Reduces coupling, improves testability, and makes your code more flexible.</p></li></ul><p data-start="4556" data-end="4748" data-is-last-node="" data-is-only-node="">By leveraging dependency injection, Laravel keeps your code modular, testable, and easier to maintain. It’s one of the key features that help developers build scalable and robust applications.</p></div></div></div></div><div class="mb-2 flex gap-3 empty:hidden -ml-2"><div class="items-center dark:prose-invert dark"><p data-start="0" data-end="407">Database transactions in Laravel allow you to execute a series of database operations as a single unit of work. This means that if any of the operations within the transaction fail, all of the changes can be rolled back, ensuring your database remains consistent. It's like promising to throw a party where if one part of the setup fails, you can cancel the entire event rather than having a half-set party!</p><hr data-start="409" data-end="412"><h3 data-start="414" data-end="448">Why Use Database Transactions?</h3><ul data-start="450" data-end="776"><li data-start="450" data-end="578"><strong data-start="452" data-end="466">Atomicity:</strong><br data-start="466" data-end="469">Ensure that all operations within a transaction complete successfully; otherwise, none of them are applied.</li><li data-start="579" data-end="687"><strong data-start="581" data-end="602">Data Consistency:</strong><br data-start="602" data-end="605">Prevent partial updates that might leave your database in an inconsistent state.</li><li data-start="688" data-end="776"><strong data-start="690" data-end="709">Error Handling:</strong><br data-start="709" data-end="712">If something goes wrong, you can easily roll back the changes.</li></ul><hr data-start="778" data-end="781"><h3 data-start="783" data-end="830">How to Use Database Transactions in Laravel</h3><p data-start="832" data-end="889">Laravel provides a couple of ways to handle transactions:</p><hr data-start="891" data-end="894"><h4 data-start="896" data-end="940">1. Using the <code data-start="914" data-end="933">DB::transaction()</code> Method</h4><p data-start="942" data-end="1123">This is the simplest way to execute a transaction. Laravel will automatically commit the transaction if the closure executes successfully, or roll it back if an exception is thrown.</p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="1125" data-end="1574"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">php</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none px-4 py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-xs"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-php"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">use</span> <span class="hljs-title">Illuminate</span>\<span class="hljs-title">Support</span>\<span class="hljs-title">Facades</span>\<span class="hljs-title">DB</span>;

DB::<span class="hljs-title function_ invoke__">transaction</span>(function () {
    <span class="hljs-comment">// Insert a new user</span>
    <span class="hljs-variable">$userId</span> = DB::<span class="hljs-title function_ invoke__">table</span>(<span class="hljs-string">'users'</span>)-&gt;<span class="hljs-title function_ invoke__">insertGetId</span>([
        <span class="hljs-string">'name'</span>  =&gt; <span class="hljs-string">'John Doe'</span>,
        <span class="hljs-string">'email'</span> =&gt; <span class="hljs-string">'john@example.com'</span>,
        <span class="hljs-string">'password'</span> =&gt; <span class="hljs-title function_ invoke__">bcrypt</span>(<span class="hljs-string">'secret'</span>)
    ]);

    <span class="hljs-comment">// Insert an associated profile for the user</span>
    DB::<span class="hljs-title function_ invoke__">table</span>(<span class="hljs-string">'profiles'</span>)-&gt;<span class="hljs-title function_ invoke__">insert</span>([
        <span class="hljs-string">'user_id'</span> =&gt; <span class="hljs-variable">$userId</span>,
        <span class="hljs-string">'bio'</span>     =&gt; <span class="hljs-string">'Just another Laravel developer.'</span>
    ]);
});
</span></code></div></div></pre><p data-start="1576" data-end="1690">In this example, if either the user or profile insert fails, Laravel will automatically roll back both operations.</p><hr data-start="1692" data-end="1695"><h4 data-start="1697" data-end="1734">2. Manual Transaction Management</h4><p data-start="1736" data-end="1860">If you need more fine-grained control, you can manually begin a transaction, commit it, or roll it back in case of an error.</p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="1862" data-end="2552"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">php</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none px-4 py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-xs"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-php"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">use</span> <span class="hljs-title">Illuminate</span>\<span class="hljs-title">Support</span>\<span class="hljs-title">Facades</span>\<span class="hljs-title">DB</span>;

DB::<span class="hljs-title function_ invoke__">beginTransaction</span>();

<span class="hljs-keyword">try</span> {
    <span class="hljs-comment">// Insert a new user</span>
    <span class="hljs-variable">$userId</span> = DB::<span class="hljs-title function_ invoke__">table</span>(<span class="hljs-string">'users'</span>)-&gt;<span class="hljs-title function_ invoke__">insertGetId</span>([
        <span class="hljs-string">'name'</span>  =&gt; <span class="hljs-string">'Jane Doe'</span>,
        <span class="hljs-string">'email'</span> =&gt; <span class="hljs-string">'jane@example.com'</span>,
        <span class="hljs-string">'password'</span> =&gt; <span class="hljs-title function_ invoke__">bcrypt</span>(<span class="hljs-string">'secret'</span>)
    ]);

    <span class="hljs-comment">// Insert an associated profile for the user</span>
    DB::<span class="hljs-title function_ invoke__">table</span>(<span class="hljs-string">'profiles'</span>)-&gt;<span class="hljs-title function_ invoke__">insert</span>([
        <span class="hljs-string">'user_id'</span> =&gt; <span class="hljs-variable">$userId</span>,
        <span class="hljs-string">'bio'</span>     =&gt; <span class="hljs-string">'Laravel enthusiast and coffee lover.'</span>
    ]);

    <span class="hljs-comment">// Commit the transaction if all operations succeed</span>
    DB::<span class="hljs-title function_ invoke__">commit</span>();
} <span class="hljs-keyword">catch</span> (\<span class="hljs-built_in">Exception</span> <span class="hljs-variable">$e</span>) {
    <span class="hljs-comment">// An error occurred; rollback the transaction...</span>
    DB::<span class="hljs-title function_ invoke__">rollBack</span>();

    <span class="hljs-comment">// Optionally, log or handle the exception</span>
    <span class="hljs-keyword">throw</span> <span class="hljs-variable">$e</span>;
}
</span></code></div></div></pre><p data-start="2554" data-end="2730">In this manual approach, you explicitly start a transaction with <code data-start="2619" data-end="2643">DB::beginTransaction()</code>, then either <code data-start="2657" data-end="2667">commit()</code> if everything works or <code data-start="2691" data-end="2703">rollBack()</code> if an exception is caught.</p><hr data-start="2732" data-end="2735"><h3 data-start="2737" data-end="2748">Summary</h3><ul data-start="2750" data-end="3159"><li data-start="2750" data-end="2861"><strong data-start="2752" data-end="2768">Transactions</strong> allow you to group multiple database operations so that they either all succeed or all fail.</li><li data-start="2862" data-end="2958"><strong data-start="2864" data-end="2887"><code data-start="2866" data-end="2885">DB::transaction()</code></strong> is a convenient method that handles commit and rollback automatically.</li><li data-start="2959" data-end="3041"><strong data-start="2961" data-end="2984">Manual transactions</strong> give you more control over the process when you need it.</li><li data-start="3042" data-end="3159">Using transactions helps maintain data integrity and prevents your database from ending up in a half-updated state.</li></ul><p data-start="3161" data-end="3347" data-is-last-node="" data-is-only-node="">With these tools, you can handle complex data operations in Laravel with confidence, ensuring your "party" goes off without a hitch—or cancels completely if something unexpected <span class="hljs-title class_">Route</span>::<span class="hljs-title function_ invoke__">apiResource</span>(<span class="hljs-string">'products'</span>, <span class="hljs-title class_">ProductController</span>::<span class="hljs-variable language_">class</span>);

<span class="hljs-keyword">namespace</span> <span class="hljs-title class_">App</span>\<span class="hljs-title class_">Http</span>\<span class="hljs-title class_">Controllers</span>\<span class="hljs-title class_">API</span>;

<span class="hljs-keyword">use</span> <span class="hljs-title">App</span>\<span class="hljs-title">Http</span>\<span class="hljs-title">Controllers</span>\<span class="hljs-title">Controller</span>;
<span class="hljs-keyword">use</span> <span class="hljs-title">App</span>\<span class="hljs-title">Models</span>\<span class="hljs-title">Product</span>;
<span class="hljs-keyword">use</span> <span class="hljs-title">Illuminate</span>\<span class="hljs-title">Http</span>\<span class="hljs-title">Request</span>;

<span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span> <span class="hljs-title">ProductController</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">extends</span> <span class="hljs-title">Controller</span>
</span>{
    <span class="hljs-comment">// GET /api/products</span>
    <span class="hljs-keyword">public</span> <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> <span class="hljs-title">index</span>(<span class="hljs-params"></span>)
    </span>{
        <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-title function_ invoke__">response</span>()-&gt;<span class="hljs-title function_ invoke__">json</span>(<span class="hljs-title class_">Product</span>::<span class="hljs-title function_ invoke__">all</span>(), <span class="hljs-number">200</span>);
    }

    <span class="hljs-comment">// GET /api/products/{id}</span>
    <span class="hljs-keyword">public</span> <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> <span class="hljs-title">show</span>(<span class="hljs-params"><span class="hljs-variable">$id</span></span>)
    </span>{
        <span class="hljs-variable">$product</span> = <span class="hljs-title class_">Product</span>::<span class="hljs-title function_ invoke__">find</span>(<span class="hljs-variable">$id</span>);
        <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (!<span class="hljs-variable">$product</span>) {
            <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-title function_ invoke__">response</span>()-&gt;<span class="hljs-title function_ invoke__">json</span>([<span class="hljs-string">'message'</span> =&gt; <span class="hljs-string">'Product not found'</span>], <span class="hljs-number">404</span>);
        }
        <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-title function_ invoke__">response</span>()-&gt;<span class="hljs-title function_ invoke__">json</span>(<span class="hljs-variable">$product</span>, <span class="hljs-number">200</span>);
    }

    <span class="hljs-comment">// POST /api/products</span>
    <span class="hljs-keyword">public</span> <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> <span class="hljs-title">store</span>(<span class="hljs-params">Request <span class="hljs-variable">$request</span></span>)
    </span>{
        <span class="hljs-comment">// Validate request data</span>
        <span class="hljs-variable">$validated</span> = <span class="hljs-variable">$request</span>-&gt;<span class="hljs-title function_ invoke__">validate</span>([
            <span class="hljs-string">'name'</span>        =&gt; <span class="hljs-string">'required|string|max:255'</span>,
            <span class="hljs-string">'description'</span> =&gt; <span class="hljs-string">'nullable|string'</span>,
            <span class="hljs-string">'price'</span>       =&gt; <span class="hljs-string">'required|numeric'</span>,
        ]);

        <span class="hljs-variable">$product</span> = <span class="hljs-title class_">Product</span>::<span class="hljs-title function_ invoke__">create</span>(<span class="hljs-variable">$validated</span>);
        <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-title function_ invoke__">response</span>()-&gt;<span class="hljs-title function_ invoke__">json</span>(<span class="hljs-variable">$product</span>, <span class="hljs-number">201</span>);
    }

    <span class="hljs-comment">// PUT/PATCH /api/products/{id}</span>
    <span class="hljs-keyword">public</span> <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> <span class="hljs-title">update</span>(<span class="hljs-params">Request <span class="hljs-variable">$request</span>, <span class="hljs-variable">$id</span></span>)
    </span>{
        <span class="hljs-variable">$product</span> = <span class="hljs-title class_">Product</span>::<span class="hljs-title function_ invoke__">find</span>(<span class="hljs-variable">$id</span>);
        <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (!<span class="hljs-variable">$product</span>) {
            <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-title function_ invoke__">response</span>()-&gt;<span class="hljs-title function_ invoke__">json</span>([<span class="hljs-string">'message'</span> =&gt; <span class="hljs-string">'Product not found'</span>], <span class="hljs-number">404</span>);
        }

        <span class="hljs-comment">// Validate request data</span>
        <span class="hljs-variable">$validated</span> = <span class="hljs-variable">$request</span>-&gt;<span class="hljs-title function_ invoke__">validate</span>([
            <span class="hljs-string">'name'</span>        =&gt; <span class="hljs-string">'sometimes|required|string|max:255'</span>,
            <span class="hljs-string">'description'</span> =&gt; <span class="hljs-string">'nullable|string'</span>,
            <span class="hljs-string">'price'</span>       =&gt; <span class="hljs-string">'sometimes|required|numeric'</span>,
        ]);

        <span class="hljs-variable">$product</span>-&gt;<span class="hljs-title function_ invoke__">update</span>(<span class="hljs-variable">$validated</span>);
        <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-title function_ invoke__">response</span>()-&gt;<span class="hljs-title function_ invoke__">json</span>(<span class="hljs-variable">$product</span>, <span class="hljs-number">200</span>);
    }

    <span class="hljs-comment">// DELETE /api/products/{id}</span>
    <span class="hljs-keyword">public</span> <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> <span class="hljs-title">destroy</span>(<span class="hljs-params"><span class="hljs-variable">$id</span></span>)
    </span>{
        <span class="hljs-variable">$product</span> = <span class="hljs-title class_">Product</span>::<span class="hljs-title function_ invoke__">find</span>(<span class="hljs-variable">$id</span>);
        <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (!<span class="hljs-variable">$product</span>) {
            <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-title function_ invoke__">response</span>()-&gt;<span class="hljs-title function_ invoke__">json</span>([<span class="hljs-string">'message'</span> =&gt; <span class="hljs-string">'Product not found'</span>], <span class="hljs-number">404</span>);
        }

        <span class="hljs-variable">$product</span>-&gt;<span class="hljs-title function_ invoke__">delete</span>();
        <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-title function_ invoke__">response</span>()-&gt;<span class="hljs-title function_ invoke__">json</span>([<span class="hljs-string">'message'</span> =&gt; <span class="hljs-string">'Product deleted successfully'</span>], <span class="hljs-number">200</span>);
    }
}

dark:prose-invert dark"><p data-start="0" data-end="115">The <strong data-start="4" data-end="21">composer.json</strong> file is like the blueprint of your PHP (and Laravel) project. It serves several key purposes:</p><ul data-start="117" data-end="1160"><li data-start="117" data-end="379"><p data-start="119" data-end="379"><strong data-start="119" data-end="145">Dependency Management:</strong><br data-start="145" data-end="148">It lists all the external packages your project requires (with version constraints). When you run Composer commands (like <code data-start="272" data-end="290" data-is-only-node="">composer install</code> or <code data-start="294" data-end="311">composer update</code>), Composer reads this file to install or update these dependencies.</p></li><li data-start="381" data-end="598"><p data-start="383" data-end="598"><strong data-start="383" data-end="404">Project Metadata:</strong><br data-start="404" data-end="407">It contains important details about your project such as its name, description, version, license, and authors. This information is useful both for documentation and for publishing packages.</p></li><li data-start="600" data-end="816"><p data-start="602" data-end="816"><strong data-start="602" data-end="632">Autoloading Configuration:</strong><br data-start="632" data-end="635">It defines how your project’s PHP classes should be autoloaded. This allows Composer to automatically load your classes without requiring manual <code data-start="782" data-end="791" data-is-only-node="">require</code> or <code data-start="795" data-end="804">include</code> statements.</p></li><li data-start="818" data-end="1005"><p data-start="820" data-end="1005"><strong data-start="820" data-end="843">Script Definitions:</strong><br data-start="843" data-end="846">You can define custom scripts that run specific tasks (e.g., tests, migrations) before or after certain Composer commands. This helps automate routine tasks.</p></li><li data-start="1007" data-end="1160"><p data-start="1009" data-end="1160"><strong data-start="1009" data-end="1038">Repository Configuration:</strong><br data-start="1038" data-end="1041">If your project depends on packages that aren’t available on Packagist, you can specify additional repositories here.</p></li></ul><p data-start="1162" data-end="1383" data-is-last-node="" data-is-only-node="">In summary, <strong data-start="1174" data-end="1191">composer.json</strong> is essential for managing your project's dependencies, setting up autoloading, and organizing various configurations and scripts—all of which help keep your project maintainable and scalable.</p></div></div></div></div><div class="mb-2 flex gap-3 empty:hidden
